body.footer:
------- Additional comments from davisn@dev.java.net Wed Jul 1 23:35:04 +0000
2009 ------- When trying to add a 2nd jdbc resource/connection to the sun-resources.xml file through the Sun Resources File wizard, I got complain the "file already exist" and do not allow me to add the 2nd entry to the file
body.para: Steps To Reproduce: 1. Install Eclipse bundle 2. Create a web dynamic project 3. Right-click on the project, select New -> Other -> GlassFish -> JDBC Resources to create a new jdbc resource 4. Repeat step 3 to create another JDBC Resource BUG: Can't create a 2nd jdbc resource through the Resources File wizard
